snippet: The Yankees are hoping that C.C. Sabathia’s 30-day stint in an alcohol rehabilitation clinic last fall might have the same restorative effect on his body that Sabathia says it has had on his soul.
abstract: New York Yankees pitcher C C Sabathia, newly sober and team's highest paid player, is struggling to secure spot in starting rotation.
lead_paragraph: The Yankees are hoping that C.C. Sabathia’s 30-day stint in an alcohol rehabilitation clinic last fall might have the same restorative effect on his body that Sabathia says it has had on his soul.

headline.main: Sabathia May Not Stay a Starter, Despite His Sobriety and a $25 Million Salary
headline.print_headline: Sabathia May Not Stay a Starter, Despite His Sobriety and a $25 Million Salary
